attributes.action: Lower train prices for students over the age of 16
attributes.background: Students from Kent campaigning for lower train prices for over 16 year olds still in education.

rejection.details:
Aged-based transport fares are not set by the UK Government. Train fares are set by train operating companies.

You could start a new petition asking Parliament to change the law, to require all operators to offer child fares or child tickets for anyone under 18.
